## CodeBuilderOptions.active property

Whether the component is active and receives keyboard input (default: `false`<!-- -->).

**Signature:**

```typescript
active?: boolean;
```

## Remarks

When active, the code viewer responds to keyboard navigation (arrow keys, page up/down, etc.) for scrolling through the code.
